CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system , the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system has higher EQE values of 30-40 % in the range of 450-850 nm , which contributes to the improvement of I SC from 11.31 to 14.87 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system
2. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system
3. PCBM
4. PC 70 BM
5. EQE (Quantity, not a material, but included for completeness)

The first two entities are the systems, and the last three are the materials mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCBM |
| PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) |
| PC 70 BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system , the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system has higher EQE values of 30-40 % in the range of 450-850 nm , which contributes to the improvement of I SC from 11.31 to 14.87 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system
2. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system
3. PCBM system
4. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system (implicit, mentioned as "this system")
5. EQE values
6. range of 450-850 nm
7. I SC
8. 11.31 mA / cm^2
9. 14.87 mA / cm^2

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are: EQE values, I SC, and the acronyms PDTP, DTDPP(Bu), PCBM, and PC 70 BM.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. EQE values
2. I SC

So, the relevant "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are the material properties EQE values and I SC.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| EQE values |
| I SC |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system , the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system has higher EQE values of 30-40 % in the range of 450-850 nm , which contributes to the improvement of I SC from 11.31 to 14.87 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system: This is a system or device with unspecified properties.
2. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system: This is another system or device with unspecified properties.
3. PCBM system: This is another system or device with unspecified properties, but it is mentioned in relation to the first two systems.
4. EQE values: These are the external quantum efficiencies of the systems.
5. 30-40 %: This is the range of EQE value for the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system.
6. 450-850 nm: This is the range of wavelengths.
7. I SC: This is the short circuit current density.
8. 11.31 mA / cm^2: This is the initial short circuit current density.
9. 14.87 mA / cm^2: This is the improved short circuit current density.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. EQE values: These are the external quantum efficiencies.
2. 30-40 %: This is the range of EQE values for the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value                   |
|-------------------------------|
| EQE values (for PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system) |
| 30-40 %                      |
